paragraphs.body: What I am really asking is the text, the episodes' transcripts are legal but in this sense would posting at least the text of this book would be illegal? I suppose it would be, but could I be sure along with someone look into this? Thanks for now.
section: Film talk:The Last Airbender Movie Novelization
Would it be legal or illegal to Upload the Book?
